alert.note: Alert for Harris; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:54AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Troup and northwestern Harris Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 554 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lakeview, or near Lanett, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hamilton, West Point, Piedmont Heights, Cannonville, Big Springs, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Whitesville-Pine Lake and Long Cane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
